s.text: If Bradley can explain why Gore would be an inferior president, why should he have to wait to say so?

Why should Bush get credit for keeping his hands clean and preserving his above-the-fray image if, as Forbes alleges, he has achieved this by letting the RLC do his dirty work?

The RLC ad says Forbes "hurt the Republican Party" in 1996 and will "help the Democrats" in 2000 by criticizing his GOP rivals.
